When airplane mode is on, your cellular connection, Wi-Fi, radio and Bluetooth settings are automatically turned off. You can still use your phone and open apps without a cellular connection.

Wi-Fi calling allows to make and receive calls over a Wi-Fi network if cellular is not available. Dialing 911 via Wi-Fi network can provide the information to emergency services if you’re unable to report the physical location.

"Wi-Fi Calling supports the ability to make and receive calls using a Wi-Fi network if Cellular is not available; such as inside a residence or building. Dialing 911 via Wi-Fi network can provide the information to emergency services if you are unable to report the physical location.
To enable, please activate “Advanced Calling”, then activate Wi-Fi Calling within your settings."
Your voice over Wi-Fi setting is on.

"Enhanced Verizon Store Visits
Agree to My Verizon Mobile's improved in-store experience, and when you visit a Verizon Wireless store, you'll get:
• ability to use your device to scan and purchase Verizon products •promotional offers and account notifications right on your device • automatic check-in for appointments, workshops and in-store pickups you have scheduled • ability to notify our staff when you need assistance.
By agreeing, you give Verizon permission to use your device's Wi-Fi or Bluetooth settings to determine when you're near a Verizon Wireless store."
Turn on Location Services to Allow My Verizon to Determine Your Location
